# Be.in the loop!

The best way to get us to respond quickly is to make an issue on any of our Github repositories: Tokin Software

If there's no rush: admin@tokin.io

If you grok the smell we're cooking and can't wait to eat, use the simple form below to join the community.

We'll email you with an invite to the game. We will not spam you, dear player, because we all get the same notifications! We look forward to playing the game with you.
Improve this page, earn some Tok!
